titles.title: Behold the Lamb with glory crowned

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold the Lamb with glory crowned, To Him all pow’r is giv’n: No place too high for Him is found, No place too high in heav’n.{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}This song be ours, we join in one To celebrate the Name Of Him that sits upon the throne, And to exalt the Lamb.{/lang-eng}
